oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Senator John F. Kennedy in Nashville, 1959 March 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Senator and Mrs. John F. Kennedy visited Nashville on March 2nd, 1959. Kennedy spoke at a sold out Democratic party banquet at the Maxwell House Hotel in downtown Nashville. Mayor Ben West acted as toastmaster for the event. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kennedy, John F. (John Fitzgerald), 1917-1963; West, Ben, 1911-1974
Maxwell House Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.)
